Package com.challenge.pom

Class Base

java.lang.Object
com.challenge.pom.Base
Direct Known Subclasses:
CategoryPage, ContactPage, IndexPage, NavigationHeader, SearchPage, ShoppingCartPage
public class Base extends Object
This is a base wrapper class that wraps selenium's main actions into a single class for easy access and segmentation of the code. It also protects main code from deprecation of methods, classes, variable name change, etc. Having a wrapper class centralizes problems related to the framework, thus, final test method won't suffer any change at all from even if at some point in future we decide to use another framework different from selenium
Author:
Jorge Canario

  • Field Details

    • ACTION

      public static final int ACTION
      Is a variable used to classify certain logged information as actions
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DEBUG

      public static final int DEBUG
      Is a variable used to classify certain logged information as debug. Difference between actions and debug: debug are steps to complete an action, while an action involves several steps
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • ALERT

      public static final int ALERT
      Is a variable used to classify certain logged information as alert. Logs clasified as ALERT informs that certain step failed because of some situation
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • FAILURE

      public static final int FAILURE
      Is a variable used to classify certain logged information as actions. Informs about the status of the latest opened action (LIFO). For logs labeled as FAILURE, latest action couldn't be completed because of some reason
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • SUCCESS

      public static final int SUCCESS
      Is a variable used to classify certain logged information as actions. Informs about the status of the latest opened action (LIFO). For logs labeled as SUCCESS, latest action was completed successfully
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Base

      public Base​(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
      Base constructor class to instanciate.
      Parameters:
      driver - refers to the driver that will be performing actions. This class perform actions over a instance of a browser, that instance of the browser can be thought as the driver.

  • Method Details

    • driverConnection

      public org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driverConnection​(String browser)
      This methods setups the correct connection for the driver to operate. Unless called from outside the class the driver can't control nothing.
      Parameters:
      browser - This variable informs about the browser that is going to run the test. Based on the browser name, we select the proper driver for the connection
      Returns:
      driver The driver that is now connected to the correct browser driver

    • findElement

      public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement findElement​(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Wrapper method to find an element based on the locator of the element
      Parameters:
      locator - is a By class element that specifies the location in the HTML of the element to find
      Returns:
      an instance of the WebElement that was found using the locator

    • findElements

      public List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> findElements​(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Wrapper method to find the elements based on the locator of the elements. When using this methods user is hoping to find several elements that share the same locator
      Parameters:
      locator - is a By class element that specifies the location in the HTML of the elements to find.
      Returns:
      a List of WebElement whose HTML corresponds to the By locator specified as input

    • getText

      public String getText​(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
      Wrapper method used to find the text inside a WebElement
      Parameters:
      element - the element whose text we want to find
      Returns:
      a String of text corresponding to the text in the WebElement

    • getText

      public String getText​(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Overridden wrapper method used to find the text inside a locator
      Parameters:
      locator - the locator specifying the location of the element whose text is to find
      Returns:
      a String of text corresponding to the text in the WebElement

    • clearAndSendKeys

      public void clearAndSendKeys​(String inputText, org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Method tries to find an inputtext element in the provided locator, clear (in case pending text was left in it) and writes the specified text
      Parameters:
      inputText - the text that want to be typed into the inputText field
      locator - the inputText where we want to type the text

    • clearTypeAndSubmit

      public void clearTypeAndSubmit​(String inputText, org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Method tries to find an inputtext element in the provided locator, clear (in case pending text was left in it) and writes the specified text and submit the entry
      Parameters:
      inputText - the text that want to be typed and submitted into the inputText field
      locator - the inputText where we want to type the text

    • sendKeys

      public void sendKeys​(String inputText, org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Wrapper method to type text into a input text. This class finds the element and then writes in it.
      Parameters:
      inputText - refers to the locator of where we want to type the input text
      locator - refers to the text that wants to be typed into the inputText

    • click

      public void click​(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Wrapper class method to click the element found by the provided locator
      Parameters:
      locator - the location of element that wants to be clicked

    • click

      public void click​(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
      Overridden wrapper class method to click the element provided
      Parameters:
      element - refers to the element that wants to be clicked

    • isDisplayed

      public Boolean isDisplayed​(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Wrapper method to verify certain element has loaded correctly in the HTML.
      Parameters:
      locator - refers to the location in the HTML of the element that we are checking its visibility
      Returns:
      A boolean value confirming if it was possible to find the requested element

    • get

      public void get​(String url)
      Wrapper class used to navigate to URLs
      Parameters:
      url - refers to the website (URL), we want to visit

    • moveToElement

      public void moveToElement​(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Wrapper class used to hover an element located in the provided locator
      Parameters:
      locator - the location in the HTML of the element that wants to be hovered

    • moveToElement

      public void moveToElement​(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
      Overridden wrapper class used to hover an element
      Parameters:
      element - refers to the element that wants to be hovered

    • moveToElementAndClick

      public void moveToElementAndClick​(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Methods hover the element before clicking it
      Parameters:
      locator - the location in the HTML of the element that wants to be hovered and clicked

    • zoomOut

      public void zoomOut()
      Methods allow to zoom out the page. For this it uses the combination of CTRL + "-" shortcut

    • zoomIn

      public void zoomIn()
      Methods allow to zoom in the page. For this it uses the combination of CTRL + "+" shortcut

    • zoomNormal

      public void zoomNormal()
      Methods allow to set the zoom to normal i.e. 100% . For this it uses the combination of CTRL + 0 shortcut

    • waitForPresenceOf

      public void waitForPresenceOf​(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Wait for certain element to be present in the webdriver. i.e. to be visible in the screen.
      Parameters:
      locator - the location of the element that we're waiting

    • waitForToBeClickabe

      public void waitForToBeClickabe​(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Wait for certain element to be clickable in the webdriver i.e. not only visible but to be able to respond to clicks event.
      Parameters:
      locator - the location of the element that we're waiting

    • scrollToTop

      public void scrollToTop()
      Scroll current page until it reaches the top of the page.

    • scrollToBottom

      public void scrollToBottom()
      Scroll current page until it reaches the bottom of the page

    • scrollToDown

      public void scrollToDown()
      Scroll current page a little bit down

    • scrollToElementTop

      public void scrollToElementTop​(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
      Scroll until the top the element is visible in the page
      Parameters:
      element - the element whose top we are looking for

    • scrollToElementBottom

      public void scrollToElementBottom​(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
      Scroll until the bottom of the element is visible in the page
      Parameters:
      element - the element whose bottom we are looking for

    • refreshPage

      public void refreshPage()
      Refreshes the page. F5. Normally used when certain action need the page to refresh to show results

    • scrnCapture

      public void scrnCapture()
      Take a screenshot of the current page, at the position it is. Screenshot will show what is visible at the moment when it was called. Screenshots are taken and saved into the "emailablereport" file

    • getDate

      public String getDate()
      A class to calculate the current date and return it
      Returns:
      a String with the date in the following format: yy-MM-dd-hhmmssS

    • report

      public void report​(String input, int notificationType)
      Method used to do log with correct formatting in the report generated by the automation
      Parameters:
      input - refers to the text that will be logged
      notificationType - refers to the classification of the log: DEBUG, ALERT, ACTION, FAILURE, SUCCESS

    • takeFullDOMScrnshot

      public void takeFullDOMScrnshot()
      This method takes a full DOM with viewport more than 1200px of the page and save it in the project directory as 'pixelPerfectviewport1200pxCmpImg.jpg'
